languages.text: "Ваша Светлость! Чудовищный шторм разразился на Янусе! Апокалиптические аномалии терзают наш агромир, и эпицентр их — оскверненный сектор! Необходимо что-то делать, пока вся колония не погибла! Необходимо... найти источник этого лиходейства!"

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! A monstrous storm has broken out on Janus! Apocalyptic anomalies are tearing our agri-world apart, and their epicentre is in the corrupted sector! Something must be done before the whole colony is destroyed! We must find the source of this... madness!"
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость! Чудовищный шторм разразился на Янусе! Апокалиптические аномалии терзают наш агромир, и эпицентр их — оскверненный сектор! Необходимо что-то делать, пока вся колония не погибла! Необходимо... найти источник этого лиходейства!"

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! A monstrous storm has broken out on Janus! The apocalyptic anomalies are tearing our agri-world apart, and their epicentre is a desecrated sector! Something must be done before the whole colony is destroyed! We have... to find the source of this madness!"

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! A monstrous storm has broken out on Janus! The apocalyptic anomalies are tearing our agri-world apart, and their epicentre is a desecrated sector! Something must be done before the whole colony is destroyed! We have... to find the source of this madness!"

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! A monstrous storm has broken out on Janus! The apocalyptic anomalies are tearing our agri-world apart, and their epicentre is in the desecrated sector! Something must be done before the whole colony is destroyed! We have... to find the source of this madness!"

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! A monstrous storm has broken out on Janus! Apocalyptic anomalies are tearing our agri-world apart, and their epicentre is in the corrupted sector! Something must be done before the whole colony is destroyed! We must find the source of this... madness!"

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! A monstrous storm has broken out on Janus! Apocalyptic anomalies are tearing our agri-world apart, and their epicentre is in the corrupted sector! Something must be done before the whole colony is destroyed! We must find the source of this... madness!"

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! A monstrous storm has broken out on Janus! Apocalyptic anomalies are tearing our agri-world apart, and their epicentre is in the corrupted sector! Something must be done before the whole colony is destroyed! We must find the source of this... madness!"

languages.text: “大人！一场极其凶暴的风暴袭击了加努斯！世界末日般的异象正在撕裂我们的农业世界，而它们的中心就在那片腐化的区域！我们得赶在整个殖民地被摧毁之前做点什么！我们必须……必须找到这疯狂的根源！”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! A monstrous storm has broken out on Janus! Apocalyptic anomalies are tearing our agri-world apart, and their epicentre is in the corrupted sector! Something must be done before the whole colony is destroyed! We must find the source of this... madness!"

traits.locale_text: “大人！一场极其凶暴的风暴袭击了加努斯！世界末日般的异象正在撕裂我们的农业世界，而它们的中心就在那片腐化的区域！我们得赶在整个殖民地被摧毁之前做点什么！我们必须……必须找到这疯狂的根源！”
“大人！一场极其凶暴的风暴袭击了加努斯！世界末日般的异象正在撕裂我们的农业世界，而它们的中心就在那片亵渎区域！我们得赶在整个殖民地被摧毁之前做点什么！我们必须……必须找到这疯狂的根源！”

languages.text: «¡Mi{mf|lord|lady}! ¡Una monstruosa tempestad asola Janus! Las anomalías apocalípticas están destrozando su mundo agrícola, ¡y su epicentro está en el sector corrupto! ¡Hay que hacer algo antes de que toda la colonia acabe destruida! ¡Tenemos que encontrar el origen de esta... locura!».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! A monstrous storm has broken out on Janus! Apocalyptic anomalies are tearing our agri-world apart, and their epicentre is in the corrupted sector! Something must be done before the whole colony is destroyed! We must find the source of this... madness!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Mi{mf|lord|lady}! ¡Una monstruosa tempestad asola Janus! Las anomalías apocalípticas están destrozando su mundo agrícola, ¡y su epicentro está en el sector corrupto! ¡Hay que hacer algo antes de que toda la colonia acabe destruida! ¡Tenemos que encontrar el origen de esta... locura!».

languages.text: 「陛下！ヤヌスに巨大な嵐が発生しました！絶望的なアノマリーが農業惑星を引き裂き、その震央は汚されたセクターにあります！コロニー全体が破壊される前に何か手を打たなければなりません！この...狂気の源を探し当てねばなりません！」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! A monstrous storm has broken out on Janus! Apocalyptic anomalies are tearing our agri-world apart, and their epicentre is in the corrupted sector! Something must be done before the whole colony is destroyed! We must find the source of this... madness!"

traits.locale_text: 「陛下！ヤヌスに巨大な嵐が発生しました！絶望的なアノマリーが農業惑星を引き裂き、その震央は冒涜されたセクターにあります！コロニー全体が破壊される前に何か手を打たなければなりません！この...狂気の源を探し当てねばなりません！」
「陛下！ヤヌスに巨大な嵐が発生しました！絶望的なアノマリーが農業惑星を引き裂き、その震央は冒涜されたセクターにあります！コロニー全体が破壊される前に何か手を打たなければなりません！この...狂気の源を探し当てねばなりません！」

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie ! Une tempête gigantesque fait rage sur Janus ! Des anomalies apocalyptiques réduisent nos infrastructures agricoles en miettes, et l'épicentre du phénomène est devenu une zone totalement corrompue ! Il faut intervenir avant que la colonie tout entière disparaisse ! Il faut trouver la source de cette... folie ! »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! A monstrous storm has broken out on Janus! Apocalyptic anomalies are tearing our agri-world apart, and their epicentre is in the corrupted sector! Something must be done before the whole colony is destroyed! We must find the source of this... madness!"

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie ! Une tempête gigantesque fait rage sur Janus ! Des anomalies apocalyptiques réduisent nos infrastructures agricoles en miettes, et l'épicentre du phénomène est devenu une zone totalement corrompue ! Il faut intervenir avant que la colonie tout entière disparaisse ! Il faut trouver la source de cette... folie ! »

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Auf Janus ist ein monströser Sturm ausgebrochen! Apokalyptische Anomalien reißen unsere Agrarwelt in Stücke, und ihr Epizentrum liegt in dem verderbten Sektor! Wir müssen etwas unternehmen, ehe die ganze Kolonie zerstört wird! Wir müssen die Quelle dieses ... Irrsinns finden!"
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! A monstrous storm has broken out on Janus! Apocalyptic anomalies are tearing our agri-world apart, and their epicentre is in the corrupted sector! Something must be done before the whole colony is destroyed! We must find the source of this... madness!"

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Auf Janus ist ein monströser Sturm ausgebrochen! Apokalyptische Anomalien reißen unsere Agrarwelt in Stücke, und ihr Epizentrum liegt in dem verderbten Sektor! Wir müssen etwas unternehmen, ehe die ganze Kolonie zerstört wird! Wir müssen die Quelle dieses ... Irrsinns finden!"

"Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Auf Janus ist ein monströser Sturm ausgebrochen! Die apokalyptischen Anomalien zerreißen unsere Agrarwelt, und ihr Epizentrum liegt im entweihten Sektor! Irgendetwas muss geschehen, bevor die ganze Kolonie zerstört wird! Wir müssen ... die Quelle dieses Irrsinns finden!"

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Janus'ta korkunç bir fırtına patlak verdi. Kıyametvari anomaliler, zirai dünyamızı altüst ediyor. Merkez üssü ise yozlaşmış sektörde! Tüm koloni yok edilmeden önce bir şeyler yapmak gerekiyor! Bu deliliğin kaynağını bulmalıyız!"
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! A monstrous storm has broken out on Janus! Apocalyptic anomalies are tearing our agri-world apart, and their epicentre is in the corrupted sector! Something must be done before the whole colony is destroyed! We must find the source of this... madness!"
